    • Uses of Player in com.risk.model.strategy

      Methods in com.risk.model.strategy with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Strategy.attack(Player p) 
      void Aggressive.attack(Player p)
      This method is used to do the attack for aggressive player The aggressive player uses his strongest country to do the attack until it has no enough armies
      void Cheater.attack(Player p)
      This method is used to do the attack for cheater player The cheater player occupies all his neighbor enemies and put one army to each new occupied country
      void Random.attack(Player p)
      This method is used to do the attack for cheater player The cheater player occupies all his neighbor enemies and put one army to each new occupied country
      void Benevolent.attack(Player p)
      This method is used to do the attack for benevolent player The benevolent player doesn't do the attack
      void Strategy.fortify(Player p) 
      void Aggressive.fortify(Player p)
      This method is used to do the fortification for aggressive player The aggressive player fortifies to maximize aggregation of forces in one country
      void Cheater.fortify(Player p)
      This method is used to do the fortification for cheater player The cheater player gets his armies of countries which have neighbor enemy doubled at fortification phase
      void Random.fortify(Player p)
      This method is used to do the fortification for random player The random player chooses two countries which are connected to each other and have enough armies And moves random armies from one to another country
      void Benevolent.fortify(Player p)
      This method is used to do the fortification for benevolent player The benevolent player will fortify one of his weakest countries
      void Strategy.reinforce(Player p) 
      void Aggressive.reinforce(Player p)
      This method is used to do the reinforcement for aggressive player The aggressive player only reinforces his strongest country
      void Cheater.reinforce(Player p)
      This method is used to do the reinforcement for cheater player The cheater player gets his armies of countries doubled at reinforcement phase
      void Random.reinforce(Player p)
      This method is used to do the reinforcement for random player The random assigns a random number of armies to one of its countries randomly
      void Benevolent.reinforce(Player p)
      This method is used to do the reinforcement for benevolent player The benevolent player will reinforce his weakest countries one by one
      void Strategy.setup(Player p) 
      void Aggressive.setup(Player p)
      This method is used to do the set up for aggressive player The aggressive player will choose one country randomly and put all his starting armies to that country
      void Cheater.setup(Player p)
      This method is used to do the set up for cheater player The cheater player randomly assigns armies to his countries at set up phase
      void Random.setup(Player p)
      This method is used to do the setup for random player The random player puts one army to one of its countries randomly each time, until all its armies are put
      void Benevolent.setup(Player p)
      This method is used to do the set up for benevolent player The benevolent player will put his starting armies to his countries one by one until all armies are put
